short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides the Doge icon from Twitter and brings back the bird.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that saves your precious eyes from the scourge of Doge and reverts the Twitter icon back to its original bird form, just like nature intended.
